# PaqueteMeteorologia

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

El objetivo del Paquete Meteorologia es descargar y analizar datos de estaciones meteorologicas.

## Instalacion

You can install the development version of PaqueteMeteorologia from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("marcosziadi/PaqueteMeteorologia")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(PaqueteMeteorologia)

#descargar_datos("NH0910", "~/")
```
